show.title: Leid Stories

header.title: A Tale of Two Cities: ‘Progress’ and Community Viability

title: A Tale of Two Cities: ‘Progress’ and Community Viability
content:
Leid Stories relates the impressions of New York City after only a year since the last visit. Snapshots of daily life... <!--more--> tell a story of a city in which the line between rich and poor has become harder; the pace of life more frenetic; the anxiety and drive associated with “making it” more palpable; and everywhere evidence of the casualties of planned “progress.
” A commentary is meant to spark discussion about the purpose of community and, more particularly, whether “the people” have lost or are losing the battle for community control.
